guidelines.source: Ethics in the Software Development Process.pdf

caseStudies.title: Emerging technologies present unique ethical challenges which
caseStudies.summary: This case study discusses the importance of equipping professionals with the skills to engage with ethical challenges posed by emerging technologies.
caseStudies.outcome: The key lesson learned is the need for incorporating ethics education in computing and technology fields to ensure ethically-focused decision making in students' work practices.
caseStudies.source: Understanding “Dark” Design Roles in Computing Education (Gray et al., 2021).pdf

caseStudies.title: need assistance in their technical development—speaking philosophically to deliberate on issues rath...
caseStudies.summary: The case study discusses the importance of considering a systematic approach to individual cases when dealing with ethical issues in technology, highlighting the need to assess technological artifacts against a variety of categories such as authority, power relations, technical security, feasibility, and societal values.
caseStudies.outcome: The key lesson from this case study is that ethical considerations in technology cannot be approached casuistically, but rather require a deliberate philosophical approach that takes into account a range of factors and perspectives. It emphasizes the importance of developing an "ethical toolbox" to guide decision-making in complex ethical dilemmas in technology.
caseStudies.source: Ethics in the Software Development Process.pdf

caseStudies.title: the growth of the role of “ethics owners” in technology companies,
caseStudies.summary: The case study discusses the growth of ethics owners in technology companies and the integration of ethics in computer science and engineering courses.
caseStudies.outcome: One key lesson is the importance of creating tools that surface discussions about values in real-world contexts to lead to actionable interventions and outcomes in technology companies.
caseStudies.source: Timelines_ A World-Building Activity for Values Advocacy (Wong & Nguyen, 2021).pdf
